programme.desc: CBeebies. Moon and Snowboarding: Pingu welcomes viewers to his secret whale-shaped funhouse for another show. The episodes are Pingu's Moon Adventure and Robby the Snowboarder. [S]
programme.title: The Pingu Show

programme.desc: CBeebies. Zigby's Magic Trick: The adventures of Zigby the Zebra and his friends. Zigby gets into all sorts of trouble when he agrees to make McMeer disappear! [S]
programme.title: Zigby

programme.desc: CBeebies. Timmy Makes a Splash: Animated adventures of a young lamb at nursery school. Everyone is having fun in the paddling pool, until Stripey pulls the stopper out of the valve. [AD,S]
programme.title: Timmy Time

programme.desc: CBeebies. Bees: Animated series about dirtgirl and her friends. Keen to find out how bees help in the garden, dirtgirl sets about making a sweet-pea teepee to attract them. [S]
programme.title: dirtgirlworld

programme.desc: CBeebies. Da Bag A Bling: Stop-motion series featuring a crime-fighting special agent who plays in a reggae band. The Easy Crew track down a bredda with a wicked hip hop vibe. [S]
programme.title: Rastamouse

programme.desc: CBBC. Animal action with Johny Pitts and Rani Price. The wildest horses in the world need their hooves trimming - but how do you catch them? The tiger cubs take their dinner by the pool. [S]
programme.title: Roar

programme.desc: CBBC. LOSE vs Lair: Frogg upgrades the Lair security system to protect Voltar's sweet new bike. [S] Followed by Leon.
programme.title: League of Super Evil

programme.desc: CBBC. Hay Day: Animation about the friendship between Lottie, a misfit, and Nine, a cat. The pinnacle of the Oddsburg Hay Day celebrations is a hay sculpting competition. [S] Followed by The Owl.
programme.title: Frankenstein's Cat

programme.desc: CBBC. 20/20. Wildlife show. Jamie and Izak dig up a porker of a problem and Kat and Phoebe face up to a one-eyed horse. [S]
programme.title: Dick 'N' Dom Go Wild

programme.desc: CBeebies. 19/25. Making Music: Show for preschool children. Joel wants to make music, so Nina helps him find household objects that he can use as instruments. They then go to see a real band. [S]
programme.title: Nina and the Neurons

programme.desc: CBeebies. A Room With A View: The comic adventures of two unlikely best friends. Big and Small race each other to build a mountain in their garden so they will have a view from their window. [S]
programme.title: Big and Small

programme.desc: CBeebies. Why Snake Has No Legs: Stories telling a young audience how different animals got their distinctive parts. Snake had hundreds of legs, until he swapped them all for Millipede's eyes. [S]
programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales

programme.desc: CBeebies. 12/13. Charley Bounces Nibblit: Series about a teddy bear with a big imagination. Charley becomes a show business impresario presenting his greatest act - Nibblit! [AD,S]
programme.title: Little Charley Bear

programme.desc: CBeebies. Gone Fishing: Animation featuring Raa Raa, who lives in the Jingly Jangly Jungle. Raa Raa is keen to try fishing, but keeps scaring the fish away every time he makes a noise. [S]
programme.title: Raa Raa the Noisy Lion

programme.desc: CBeebies. 11/15. Spud's Straw Surprise: Cartoon adventures of builder Bob and his friends. Spud thinks Farmer Pickles and Bob are building a new super-sized scarecrow out of straw to replace him. [S]
programme.title: Bob the Builder: Project Build It

programme.desc: CBeebies. Josie's Knotty Problem: Frank and Buster are two intrepid koalas who fly around on a mission to help other creatures. Josie's shoelaces keep coming undone and she can't tie them. [S]
programme.title: The Koala Brothers

programme.desc: CBeebies. March of the Fluffies: Preschool stop-frame animation. The Fluffies are on an unstoppable march towards a deep canyon, so the team have to find something to act as a bridge. [S]
programme.title: Lunar Jim

programme.desc: CBeebies. Sticky: Series in which a drawn line creates challenges and surprises for the unsuspecting Dipdap. Dipdap is caught in a sticky mess when the Line draws some bubblegum. [S]
programme.title: Dipdap

programme.desc: CBeebies. Planet Shout: Children's quiz. Snout's home planet is a place of sprouts and crackling, sneezing craters. Will he try to help Twist win the race or look for his nephews? [S]
programme.title: Kerwhizz

programme.desc: CBeebies. Sky High Loopy: Driver Dan goes on an exciting journey to Story Corner. Everyone watches in amazement to see if Loopy can become a flying dinosaur. [S]
programme.title: Driver Dan's Story Train

programme.desc: CBeebies. Jumpybug: Animated series set in the magical land of Nara. Yojojo is surprised when a Jumpybug suddenly appears. He and the other Piplings play jumping games with it. [S]
programme.title: Waybuloo

programme.desc: CBeebies. Windy Day in the Garden: Series for young children. On a very windy day, Igglepiggle's blanket is blown into the air and the Tombliboos' trousers are blown off the line. [S]
